title: Eco-Modern 3-Bedroom Apartment with Solar Panels & Garden in Stare Miasto
description: Welcome to a sustainable urban haven—a modern 3-bedroom apartment in the heart of Wroclaw's vibrant Stare Miasto. This wheel-chair accessible flat features a bright, open living space, a contemporary full bathroom, and a spacious private balcony with energy-saving solar panels. The property offers a rare and tranquil private garden, as well as access to a peaceful shared courtyard, presenting a perfect combination of eco-conscious living and urban convenience. Thoughtfully designed for modern city dwellers, this 92 sqm residence merges comfort, function, and style under one green roof.
neighborhood_description: Stare Miasto is where culture, convenience, and innovation unite, offering countless shopping, dining, and entertainment options—all steps away. The neighborhood is ideal for an active and balanced lifestyle, with lush parks, well-connected public transport, and scenic bike lines. Experience Wroclaw’s best historic charm alongside dynamic eco-urban living.
target_buyer: Ideal for eco-conscious urban families or professionals passionate about sustainability, accessibility, and stylish modern city living.
market_positioning: A rare and contemporary eco-friendly urban apartment, uniquely offering green amenities and barrier-free access in a highly sought-after Wroclaw central location.
